lead_paragraph: An extraordinary 12-year-old boy, who is a cartography enthusiast, leaves his eccentric family in Montana to take off on an cross-country adventure on board a freight train to the Smithsonian Museum to receive a prize.
snippet: An extraordinary 12-year-old boy, who is a cartography enthusiast, leaves his eccentric family in Montana to take off on an cross-country adventure on board a freight train to the Smithsonian Museum to receive a prize.
